phrases.phrase: Show Top Games on Member Home
Show Top Games on Visitor Home
Show Arcade News on Member Home
Please provide a integer value for order.
The MochiMedia category list must be imported before you can import MochiMedia games. Click here to import the MochiMedia category list.

Provide a title for the game.

Swf file with that name already exists.
Please provide a Mochi Publisher Id in the arcade settings page.
Mochi game could not be found.
Mochi categories do not exist. Please run the install/update script by clicking here.
You have imported {igames} total MochiMedia games in the {scategory} category. There's still more! Click the 'Add More' button below to continue.
You have imported {igames} total MochiMedia games. There's still more! Click the 'Add More' button below to continue.
{igames} out of {itotal} total games were added.
{itotal} games have added to the category. You're finished!
Games with at least one score submitted
Users with at least one score submitted
Select 'Yes' below to confirm before resetting. This is not undoable.
Please select stat type to rebuild.
Your statistics have been rebuilt to reflect your current settings.
Updated {istart} through {iend} out of {itotal} total MochiMedia games.
Cannot rebuild activity points. The setting Activity Point is currently set at zero.

Using this script will rebuild your users' total game plays and arcade activity points. All existing information regarding this information will be cleared, then rebuilt based on your current settings. For instance, if you changed the arcade activity point reward from 1 to 2, you would run this script to retroactively give the additional reward to your arcade users for their previous activity.
Rebuilding Stats for {istart} to {iend} of {itotal} Total Users.
Start and end date cannot be the same.
End date cannot be older than start date.
Include active challenges within time frame
Clear game ratings by game type:
Clear rating by specific game ID:
Please select a game type to clear.

1. Upload your game folders to yourdomain.com/file/arcade/upload/
2. CHMOD the entire /arcade folder and its contents to 777
3. Refesh this page and the games will automatically be detected.
Please create game categories before proceeding.
{inum} games found in the file/arcade/upload/ folder.
Add these games to selected category
For "Bad Permission" errors, make sure that you CHMOD all of the /file/arcade/upload/ folder and all of its contents every time before running the mass installer.
{num}. {username} has just posted high score of {score} for {game} at {date}
{num}. {winner} beat {loser} highscore with a score of {score} for {game} at {date}
{num}. {winner} beat {loser} with a score of {score} for {game} at {date}
<title>Show Konsort.org Link</title><info>Shows the Konsort.org Link on the bottom of the Arcade Pages</info>
<title>Enable Mochi Games</title><info>Allows the games added from MochiMedia to be shown on the public side of the arcade.</info>
<title>Activity Points</title><info>Sets the amount of activity points awarded per arcade game play. If set to zero, no points will be awarded.</info>
<title>Enable Game Favorites</title><info>If enabled, the users will be able to save games as their favorites. It will make access to certain games faster.</info>
<title>Enable Challenges</title><info>Sets the User Challenges Feature On or Off.</info>
<title>Highscore Priority</title><info>This setting decides the tie breaker if multiple users submit the exact same highscore for an arcade game.</info>
<title>User Scoring Type</title><info>Sets whether you would prefer there to be only one highscore per user per game or multiple highscores per user per game.</info>

<title>Disable Non-Scoring Games</title><info>Setting this to 'true' will disable all non-highscore compatible games from showing on your arcade. This will include all single and multi-player games that do not record scores.</info>
Champion: {username} with a high score of {score}
<title>Comment on Highscores Page</title><info>When set to True, users will have the ability to comment on the selected game's highscore page.</info>
No games set as your favorites.
Game has been removed from favorites.
Game has been added to favorites.

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Initiate - Content</title><info>If challenges are enabled and a user initiates a challenge, this will be the body of the notification message sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {user}, {challenger}, {game}, and {link}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Initiate - Title</title><info>If challenges are enabled and a user initiates a challenge, this will be the title of the notification message sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {challenger}, {user}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - First Scorer - Content</title><info>If a challenge is already initiated and a challenged user submits a highscore, this will be the body of the notification message sent to the opposing user. Available replacement variables: {user}, {opponent}, {score}, {game}, {link}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - First Scorer - Title</title><info>If a challenge is already initiated and a challenged user submits a highscore, this will be the title of the notification message sent to the opposing user. Available replacement variables: {user}, {opponent}, {score}, {game}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Challenge Completed - Content</title><info>When the second challenged user submits his or her highscore, the challenge is complete. This is the title of the notification message that the opposing member will receive. Available replacement variables: {user}, {game}, {challengePage}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Challenge Completed - Title</title><info>When the second challenged user submits his or her highscore, the challenge is complete. This is the title of the notification message that the opposing member will receive. Available replacement variables: {user}, {game}, {challengePage}</info>
Click here to add games from a different category.
Your Arcade Settings have been updated. If you altered any high score affecting settings, you may want to rebuild your arcade information to reflect those changes.
Arcade ratings for game have been cleared. Edit Game
The following categories are not synced to a mochi category
Champion: {username} with a high score of {score}
You have already rated this game.

The panel below allows you to synchronize MochiMedia categories with your standard Arcade categories. If you do not sync a MochiMedia category with a standard Arcade category, any games under that MochiMedia category will display as "Uncategorized" on the public side of the Arcade.
<title>Enable Highscores in Update Feed</title><info>When enabled, shows the latest highscores on the updates feed.</info>
<title>Enable Challenges in Update Feed</title><info>When enabled, displays the challenges in the update feed.</info>
{userName} has just posted a new high score of {score} for {game}
{winnerName} beat {loserName}'s high score with a score of {score} for {game}
{winnerName} beat his own high score with a score of {score} for {game}
{winnerName} beat her own high score with a score of {score} for {game}
{winnerName} beat his or her own highscore with a score of {score} for {game}
{winnerName} beat {loserName} in a challenge with a score of {score} for {game}

<title>Import Physical MochiMedia Games Files</title><info>Importing the physical game files such as images and .SWF files are necessary to receive credit from MochiMedia to earn advertising revenue.</info>
<title>Enable Kongregate Games</title><info>Allows the games added from Kongregate to be shown on the public side of the arcade.</info>
<title>Enable Come2Play Games</title><info>Allows the games added from Come2Play to be shown on the public side of the arcade.</info>

<title>Highscore Beat - Notification Email - Content</title><info>If user's highscore is defeated, this will be the body of the notification email sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {user}, {score}, {game}, and {link}</info>

<title>Highscore Beat - Notification Email - Title</title><info>If user's highscore is defeated, this will be the title of the notification email sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {score}, {game}, {user}</info>
<title>Enable Highscore is Beaten Email</title><info>Allows an email to be sent to a user when his/her highscore is defeated.</info>
<title>Only Show MochiMedia Highscore Games</title><info>Only displays the MochiMedia games with highscore compatiblity on the public side.</info>
<title>Only Import MochiMedia Featured Games</title><info>Only imports the MochiMedia games that are featured.</info>

This script will import fresh MochiMedia files for your imported games. This is a good thing to do to stay up to date in case MochiMedia's games or game text have been updated. If you imported MochiMedia games without importing the physical files, this script can accomplish that for you so that you can receive advertising revenue from game plays. Locally hosting game files is a requirement of MochiMedia in order to get credit for game plays. If you wish to locally host MochiMedia's game files, make sure you have the option to import physical files enabled in your Arcade Settings
Rebuilding games. Built {istart} to {iend} of {itotal} Games.
There are games that need the files to be imported from MochiMedia. Please run the following script.
<title>Enable Tabular Menu on Arcade Index</title><info>Displays the categories in a tabular menu.</info>
{game} has been added to the arcade.
All Come2Play games have been added.
There are {num} Come2Play games that need to be installed.

The panel below allows you to synchronize Kongregate categories with your standard Arcade categories. If you do not sync a Kongregate category with a standard Arcade category, any games under that Kongregate category will display as "Uncategorized" on the public side of the Arcade.

<title>Enable Custom Arcade Width</title><info>Allows the arcade module to set its own width for "Arcade Game Play" pages instead of using Phpfox's default width. This is very useful if you have games that exceed Phpfox's default width.</info>
<title>Custom Arcade Width Addition</title><info>This number sets the width, in addition to the individual game's width. Usually, you will want this to be the width of your sidebar.</info>
<title>Minimum Arcade Width</title><info>If the "Custom Arcade Width" plus the individual game's width does not exceed this number, the "Arcade Game Play" page will default to this width.</info>
There are no games to remove.
There are {inum} games left to remove
There are no results for challenges
<title>Activity Points for Highscore</title><info>Sets the amount of activity points awarded when a user sets a new highest score for each game. If set to zero, no points will be awarded.</info>
<title>Guests Can Play</title><info>Regardless of any games played by the guests, they cannot post any scores or participate in user challenges.</info>
Please provide a description for report.

<title>Enable I-Frame Embed Code</title><info>When enabled, embed code for the game is generated on the game page. Users can post the game on other sites and if the users are logged in, they can have the scores submit to this site.</info>
<title>Allow Users to Add Game to Profile</title><info>When enabled, users can add and play a game to their profile page.</info>
The game is added to profile!
The game is removed from your profile.
You must be logged in to play this game.
<title>Bet Activity Points on Challenges</title><info>When challenges are enabled, users can bet using their activity points during game challenges.</info>
<title>Display Non-Scoring Tab</title><info>When non-scoring games are enabled and setting is set to true, a search tab for non-scoring game on the arcade index page is added.</info>
Please provide a integer value for your bet.
You cannot bet more points than you possess
Opponent does not have enough points.
You cannot decline a challenge where there is already a winner.

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Challenge Declined - Title</title><info>If challenges are enabled and a user declines a challenge, this will be the title of the notification message sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {challenger}, {game}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Challenge Declined - Content</title><info>If challenges are enabled and a user declines a challenge, this will be the body of the notification message sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {user}, {challenger}, {game}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Initiate with Bet - Title</title><info>If challenges are enabled, bets are enabled and a user initiates a challenge, this will be the title of the notification message sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {challenger}, {user}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Initiate with Bet - Content</title><info>If challenges are enabled, bets are enabled and a user initiates a challenge, this will be the content of the notification message sent to the receiving user. Available replacement variables: {user}, {challenger}, {game}, {link}, {bet}</info>
Score to the challenge has already been posted and is pending.

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Challenge Completed with Bet - Title</title><info>When the second challenged user submits his or her highscore, the challenge is complete. This is the title of the notification message that the opposing member will receive when there is a bet. Available replacement variables: {user}, {game}, {challengePage}, and {bet}</info>

<title>Challenge - Notification Message - Challenge Completed with Bet - Content</title><info>When the second challenged user submits his or her highscore, the challenge is complete. This is the title of the notification message that the opposing member will receive when there is a bet. Available replacement variables: {user}, {game}, {challengePage}, {bet}</info>
{winnerName} won a bet of {bet} over {loserName} in a challenge with a score of {score} for {game}
There are no games to be found.
<title>Enable Miniclip Games</title><info>Allows the games added from Miniclip to be shown on the public side of the arcade.</info>
You have been challenged by {user_full_name} to battle at {game_title}
Game could not be suggested. Suggested games must be games from www.mochimedia.com
Game could not be suggested. Please provide a valid url.
There are no high scores previously posted for this game.
You have posted a score of {score} for this game.
<title>Show High Scores Block in Thickbox for Mochi Games</title><info>When enabled, displays the high scores in a thickbox on completion of a game play on the game page.</info>
<title>Default Arcade Category</title><info>For the Tabular Menu, the selected value will be the default category.</info>
<title>Max Activity Points Allowed per Day</title><info>Maximum activity a user can gain per 24 hours. If set to zero, the limit is disabled.</info>
{num}. {winner} beat his own highscore with a score of {score} for {game} at {date}
{num}. {winner} beat her own highscore with a score of {score} for {game} at {date}
{num}. {winner} beat his or her highscore with a score of {score} for {game} at {date}
<title>Display Game Comments on Feed</title><info>When enabled, game comments will be displayed on the updates feed.</info>
{user_name} added a new comment to arcade game.
has just posted a new high score of {score} for {game_title}
beat his own high score with a score of {score} for {game_title}
beat her own high score with a score of {score} for {game_title}
beat his or her own highscore with a score of {score} for {game_title}
beat {loser_name}'s high score with a score of {score} for {game_title}
beat {loser_name} in a challenge with a score of {score} for {game_title}
won a bet of {bet} over {loser_name} in a challenge with a score of {score} for {game_title}
You have lost the challenge with {user_full_name} for the game {game_title}
You have won the challenge with {user_full_name} for the game {game_title}
{user_full_name} has submitted a score of {score} for your arcade duel at {game_title}

<title>Enable Miniclip Shockwave</title><info>Set this to True to enable adding Miniclip Shockwave (DCR Files) based games. Users will need the Adobe Shockwave Player plugin installed to play these.</info>

<title>Enable Miniclip IFrame</title><info>Set this to True to enable adding Miniclip IFrame games. These games should work in the same way regular Miniclip Flash based games do. Instead of providing a SWF Flash file, Miniclip provides the embed code for an IFrame.</info>
Provide a width for the game
Provide a height for the game
<title>Enable Manual Games</title><info>Set this to true to enable manually added games</info>
<title>Come2Play Channel ID</title><info>Set this to your Come2Play Channel ID</info>
<title>Come2Play Channel Key</title><info>Set this to your Come2Play Channel Key, found in the Dashboard->Channel Edit->Advanced->SSO section of come2play.com</info>
<title>Max SWF File Size</title><info>Prevents SWF Files larger than this value, in MB, from being downloaded when importing physical files from MochiMedia</info>
